sen.j: 藤原宗忠は仁覚の死に際し、「于今伝真言道、殊有身験、而忽被赴他界、誠是哀哉、従主上（＊堀河天皇）始、一家人々又嘆也」（「中右記」3月28日条より）と書き残している。
sen.e: At the time of the Ninkaku's death, FUJIWARA no Munetada described that 'he knew well about mantra and especially efficacious methods in esoteric Buddhism. It is a really pity that he passed away suddenly. Not only the Emperor (the Emperor Horikawa) but also all his family are mourning. (于今伝真言道、殊有身験、而忽被赴他界、誠是哀哉、従主上(*堀河天皇)始、一家人々又嘆也)' (in the section of March 28 in 'Chuyu-ki dairy').
